scripts.deploy-dev: sed -i 's/cVoGtUWf2frEb37nk32xcABCycMSlgoE/'"$OAUTH0_DEV_CLIENT_ID"'/g' src/auth0.js && sed -i 's/http:\/\/localhost:3000/https:\/\/geneaplanner-dev\.surge\.sh/g' src/index.jsx && npm run build && surge dist/ geneaplanner-dev.surge.sh
scripts.deploy-prod: sed -i 's/6fag2ujwlh/phxvjdlowb/g' src/api/api.js && sed -i 's/cVoGtUWf2frEb37nk32xcABCycMSlgoE/'"$OAUTH0_PROD_CLIENT_ID"'/g' src/auth0.js && sed -i 's/http:\/\/localhost:3000/https:\/\/geneaplanner\.surge\.sh/g' src/index.jsx && npm run build && surge dist/ geneaplanner.surge.sh
